snippet: Jonathan Conklin was given 25 years to life in the murder of Mary Whitaker, a New York City resident who was performing at the Chautauqua Institution.
abstract: Jonathan Conklin, one of two men who pleaded guilty to murder of New York City violinist Mary E Whitaker at her summer home in Westfield, NY,  in 2014, is sentenced to 25 years to life in state prison.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Conklin was given 25 years to life in the murder of Mary Whitaker, a New York City resident who was performing at the Chautauqua Institution.

headline.main: Man Sentenced for Killing Violinist at Her Western New York Summer Home
